title: Amazon is fixing Alexa’s unsolicited laughter: reports
text:
Amazon is fixing Alexa’s unsolicited laughter: reports 12:43am IST - 01:04 
Amazon says it knows why its voice-controlled assistant Alexa has been spontaneously laughing at her owners through devices like the Echo, and is working to fix the problem.   
Amazon says it knows why its voice-controlled assistant Alexa has been spontaneously laughing at her owners through devices like the Echo, and is working to fix the problem.  //reut.rs/2Hk2zqF
